infos.value: Some visions are known to be made from gathering shards...
A new comrade has made an appearance. Please remember that visions can be called to action by collecting their shards.

Although units can normally be acquired via summoning, they can also be obtained via <color=#00ffff>Unitizing</color>, the process of collecting a <color=#00ffff>specified number</color> of <color=#00ffff>Unit Shards</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Unitizing?
